summary.Title: We are urgently looking for 10 people to asbestos work in Copenhagen area!
summary.JobHeadline: We are urgently looking for 10 people to asbestos work in Copenhagen area!

JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: We are urgently looking for 10 people to asbestos work in Copenhagen area!
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
- This is a full-time job for 37 hours per week for a longer time min 2-3 months. 

- It is required that you have an asbestos certificate

- Starting date: As soon as possible

- Working hours: Monday to Friday, 07:00 - 15:00.

- Location: Copenhagen 

- Salary according to Building and Construction / Danish Industry agreements. 170kr per hour.

- It’s important that you must have Danish CPR number and work permit to take this job ! 

If you are interested in the job, send us an SMS with the job code “asbestos” to Mobile no: 31508261. We will then get in touch with you.

Mvh/regards,

Team - IMPLOY
